sense.def:
The brim of a hat
je široki del klobuka, ki na spodnjem delu štrli navzven.

Kadar je posoda z nečim napolnjena
to the brim
, je polna čisto do vrha.

seg.quote: The pool was full to the brim with brown water.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
brimming with things of a particular kind
, je polno stvari določene vrste.

seg.quote: ...a group of youngsters, all brimming with ideas.

sense.def:
Kadar posoda ali tekočina v njej
brims over
, se tekočina razlije.

seg.quote: He poured wine into Daniel's glass until it brimmed over.

sense.def:
To be brimming over with a pleasant feeling
pomeni vesti se tako, da pokažemo, kako zadovoljni smo.

seg.quote: She rushed to her mother, brimming over with joy and pride.
